tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to Dr. Luthra for my younger brother's tooth ache. My brother is disabled but the doctor was very friendly and accommodating throughout our time at the clinic. He took time to patiently listen to his medical history and guide us to the best course of action. We could feel his passion and care towards his patients and would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It was painless, refixing, cleaning etc were done with care and attention. Dr. Luthra's way of dealing with the issue deserves appreciation. His assistant silently did all supportive work.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very clean and well maintained clinic, friendly staff and expert dentist- we know what to expect when we go to Dr. Aval Luthra.

review: Dr Aval is a dynamic dentist. Very professional and approachable, he carried out the diagnosis graciously and promptly. His suggestions and the advice on the options for treatment and preventive measures were found to be very effective and workable. His calm and patient demeanor fits into his profession. He is recommended any day. I wish him the very best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience of tooth extraction  with Dr. Aval Luthra was excellent. He is very professional and friendly at the same time. He explained the problem very clearly in a layman's language. The clinic staff were polite and cooperative. Most important of all high standards of cleanliness and strict Covid protocol was followed in the clinic. This I have found missing in many dental clinics in the city. I strongly recommend dental arche for all kinds of dental treatments.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The word ‘friendly’ is used too easily these days, but I can’t stress it enough about Dr Aval Luthra. One of the  most down to earth and friendly person i have come across. With a state of the art clinic, you can rest assured that you in the best hands possible in Delhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have just started with the Damon braces treatment. Doctor listens very carefully to your questions and answers them in very simple manner which could be understood by anyone. He is professional and dedicated. I'm very satisfied and would recommend anyone looking for correction of teeth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As we were visitors in Delhi, it was a huge relief to find a good dentist in case of emergency. Dr Aval was very professional and friendly. He put our mind at ease and suggested the best options / treatments to be done. It was a satisfactory experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Ceramic Braces Fixing,Straightening Teeth (Conventional Braces),Braces,
review: Dr. Aval Luthra and his Dental Clinic - Dental Arche is my go-to place for my dental needs and an awesome dental treatment place to get great and satisfactory results for all kinds of dental issues or solutions. The important thing which i like is their hospitality, warmth to make everyone comfortable and specialised treatment and their well trained staff. But most importantly the Dr. Aval Luthra. He very skilled, supportive & infact he sometimes go out of the way to help you with your dental treatment requirements! These are some rare qualities i have come across amongst all others. I highly recommend Dr. Aval and Dental Arche. Go for it!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

Trustworthy and definitely worth it!
